title: 4th of July Part 1 with Xikar Cigar Accessories
itunes:title: 4th of July Part 1 with Xikar Cigar Accessories
description: It's an explosive show as we celebrate our independence and the deceleration of our rights and our freedoms. Kurt Van Kemple, owner and founder of Xikar Cigar Accessories, joins us... as we light up the perfect cigars to celebrate; The Fire Cracker, and the Black Bomb.
